headline: Georgia Power grid emerges stronger following Hurricane Helene
summary: One year ago, Georgia Power announced that it had largely completed immediate restoration work following Hurricane Helene with 95 percent of impacted customers restored within 8 days of the most destructive storm in the company's history. The company mobilized its largest restoration effort ever with more than 20,000 personnel responding at the peak of restoration efforts, and partnering companies from across the country. headline: How Is PPL Accelerating Decarbonization Through Research & Development?
